1.0.name: wordpress/sidesparks-tagged-chat
1.0.description: SideSparks Tagged Chat is the new method of topic-related communication on the net. Do you own a self-hosted WordPress blog? Why not take the next step from static comments to real-time communication? Just imagine: an interesting topic comes up tomorrow that you would like to discuss with some like-minded users. Wouldn't it be exciting to share the thoughts you have about this topic in real-time? Don't you think your audience would like to communicate in this way? Give them that chance.
